actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs..

official_title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to permit veterans to determine how certain drugs and medicines will be supplied to them.

summary.text: Provides that when a veteran is supplied with drugs from the Veteran's Administration, the Administrator shall permit such veteran to determine whether: (1) such drugs or medicines shall be supplied directly by the Administrator, (2) such veteran shall be reimbursed for such drugs or medicines which he obtains from a source approved by the Administrator, or (3) a source approved by the Administrator shall be reimbursed for supplying such drugs or medicines to such veterans, or such veteran will be supplied with such drugs or medicines by another method approved by the Administrator. (Amends 38 U.S.C. 620A)

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to permit veterans to determine how certain drugs and medicines will be supplied to them.
